Online Press Release Service

Many smaller software companies face the challenge of how to publicise their news to a wider audience. We can turn your story into a professionally written, eye catching news release that targets the people you want to talk to. 

  • Tell us your story and we will expose your newsworthy events to your targeted audiences
  • Produce and track a professionally written news release
  • Communicate your news story to existing customers more effectively
  • Drive traffic to your website and improve SEO ranking

Smaller software companies who don't want to commit to ongoing and lengthy external marketing agency fees will be pleased to hear that our complete range of writing services are available over flexible periods to suit your needs.  

When considering our SmartMarketing Managed Service that manages the entire process of generating qualified leads, our writing services can be incorporated as part of this programme. 

To discuss these options further, please contact us to arrange a free no obligation consultation on 01536 771440 or submit the form below to register your interest.

Get in touch to find out more

Testimonial

"We engaged with Terry Forsey Consulting as we wanted to enable ourselves to get our messages and content over to the right people, at the right time to attract website visitors, and to nurture and educate prospective customers. Our marketing approach had to be as advanced and automated as our own offering. Terry Forsey and his team managed our integration with Act-On Marketing Automation software and helped us to identify and use the intelligence we gather in the most effective and measurable way. This has given us greater visibility of our leads, measures of marketing and sales outcome and a clearer a view of where we’re spending money and ROI."
Gaynor McGrail, Marketing Manager
ETZ Timesheet Solutions
